instructions: From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'SYSTEM,' then tap Language and input . Tap the Settings icon next to Samsung keyboard . Tap English (US) . Tap one of these options: Qwerty keyboard 3 X 4 keyboard
From the alphabet keyboard, tap the 123 Sym key to enter numbers and symbols. Tap the 1/2 key for more symbols. Tap the ABC key to return to the alphabet keyboard.
From the alphabet keyboard, tap Menu . Tap Insert smiley . Tap the desired emoticon.

From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under SYSTEM , then tap Language and input . Tap the Settings icon next to Samsung keyboard . Under SMART TYPING , tap Predictive text . Tap the Predictive text switch to turn on. If necessary, select the Live word update checkbox. Select the Personalized data check box to enable these options: Learn from Facebook Learn from Gmail Learn from Twitter Learn from Messages Learn from Contacts Clear server data Clear personal data
From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under SYSTEM , tap Language and input . Tap the Settings icon next to Samsung keyboard . Under KEY-TAP FEEDBACK , select or clear the Sound checkbox.
